cozy.range_ext¶

Module Contents¶

Functions¶

remove_range_list(→ None)

Removes elements from the input_set that lie in any range in the range_list. Essentially mutates input_set to contain input_set - range_list.

intersect_range(→ range)

Computes the intersection of two ranges.
cozy.range_ext.remove_range_list(input_set: set[int], range_list: collections.abc.Iterable[range]) → None¶

Removes elements from the input_set that lie in any range in the range_list. Essentially mutates input_set to contain input_set - range_list.

Parameters:

  • input_set (set[int]) – The input set which should be mutated.

  • range_list (collections.abc.Iterable[range]) – The list of ranges to be removed from input_set.

Returns:

None

Return type:

None

cozy.range_ext.intersect_range(range_a: range, range_b: range) → range¶

Computes the intersection of two ranges.

Parameters:

  • range_a (range) – The first range

  • range_b (range) – The second range

Returns:

The intersection of range_a and range_b

Return type:

range
